bibl.title: Antinoopolis February 2014. Work in the So-Called Chiostro at the Church beside the Assumed Eastern Gate.
bibl.note: Further excavations in the large church beside the estimated eastern gate. - Searching for the western end of the church. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Antinoopolis February 2014. Work in the So-Called Chiostro at the Church beside the Assumed Eastern Gate.
Further excavations in the large church beside the estimated eastern gate. - Searching for the western end of the church. - Avec résumé en anglais.
